values: A Service of Remembrance for the Life of Larry Jens ChristensenA Service of Remembrance for the Life of Larry Jens Christensen

The only way that God, the righteous judge, can award us with a crown of righteousness is that Christ took our sin on himself at the cross and gave us his righteousness. The only way that God, the righteous judge, can award us with a crown of righteousness is that Christ took our sin on himself at the cross and gave us his righteousness.
